query:
SELECT
                            topic as "topic: _"
                            ,transaction_hash as "transaction_hash: _"
                            ,transaction_idx as "transaction_idx: _"
                            ,log_idx as "log_idx: _"
                            ,block_number as "block_number: _"
                            ,block_hash as "block_hash: _"
                        FROM topics
                        WHERE block_hash = $1
